results.title: The Valkyrie = Die Walkure
results.creator_credit: Metropolitan Opera, Peter Gelb, Brian Large and Phebe Berkowitz
results.brief_description: Includes guide in both English and German. The second installment of Wagner’s Ring des Nibelungen follows the tragic destiny og Brunnhilde, daughter of Wotan (Master of Valhalla). Sent by her father to murder Siegmund and Sieglinde, the twins borne to Wotan by a mortal, she is moved by the love she witnesses and disobbeys Wotan’s command. Wotan’s punishment is to hold Brunnhilde in a magic sleep, making her a defenceless prey for the first man who passes by and wakes her. Moved by his daughter’s plea for mercy, Wotan agrees to her request of being guarded in her sleep by a circle of flames that only a true and unrestrained hero can traverse to reach and awake her. See also: The Rhinegold (1) Siegfried (3) and Twilight of the Gods (4) of Wagner’s famous tetralogy.

results.title: The Valet's wife
results.creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
results.brief_description: A farcical comedy on an allowance provided by his uncle and the lengths he will go to in order to increase his weekly cheque. Cast includes Mack Sennett, Charles Avery, George Gebhardt, Robert Harron, Florence Lawrence. Silent film with no intertitles.

results.title: The Vacant lot
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Donald Brittain, Stanley Jackson, Derek Lamb and Judith Merritt
results.brief_description: The charming story of how a group of senior citizens managed to transform a useless vacant lot in Montreal into a garden of delights - vegetables, flowers, and parties. But the garden means much more to them than what it produces. It has completely changed their attitude about inactivity and retirement. Narrated by Patrick Watson.

results.title: The Use of measuring instruments: the burette
results.creator_credit: Australian Teaching Films and L.M. Simmons
results.brief_description: A demonstration of the correct use of the burette. Includes checking apparatus, rinsing, placing in stand, draining, filling, removing air bubbles, measuring a specified amount of liquid, emptying, cleaning and packing up after use.

results.title: The USA in world trade: round trip
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Raymond Spottiswoode and Roger Barlow
results.brief_description: Documents the importance and extent of world trade, emphasising its significance to the United States. An American auto worker, a southern farmer, a house-wife, a British machinist, a French labourer, and a Mexican farmer give their views on world trade. Dr Riefler, an economist, uses animated models to show the effects of tariffs, and reveals how nations are planning to bring about satisfactory trade arrangements.

results.title: The Urban challenge: learning a living
results.creator_credit: UNICEF, University of the State of New York, William Hetzer and Edward King
results.brief_description: Examines the plight of the urban poor in the USA, Thailand and Peru. Shows how in low income communities, opportunities for learning can be expected beyond school walls. Self-help community development projects, on-the-job training and professional guidance are organized to both increase literacy and to help people achieve a secure and rewarding life.

results.title: The Untouchables
results.creator_credit: Linson Films, Paramount Pictures, Art Linson and Brian De Palma
results.brief_description: Al Capone reigned as King in Prohibition Chicago, 1931. A team of determined government investigators, led by a young Federal Treasury agent is committed to bringing Capone to justice. Unbribable and incorruptible, they are “The Untouchables”. Kevin Costner stars as the legendary Eliot Ness in this bold action thriller by famed director Brian De Palma. Along with Costner, Sean Connery gives an award winning performance as tough beat cop Jimmy Malone, while Andy Garcia and Charles Martin Smith are the rest of the team. Robert De Niro is chilling as the sadistic but seductive Al Capone; a man who smiles when he kills.

results.title: The Unseen enemy
results.creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Don Anderson and Damian Brown
results.brief_description: Safe, basic food handling methods are necessary to prevent contamination by bacteria. This film shows how unhygienic handling of cooked meats results in food poisoning.
